issue.title: bitcoin-qt crash while performing transaction, pls help!!!!!!!!
issue.body:
my mail: cisbye.xue@gmail.com 

Satoshi
v0.8.1-beta

send bit coin to Mt.Gox, address: 1B5hFAx1xPw4b11cK5qgq19nZ3gDFRtnm9
send:13.969BTC
fee:0.0005BTC
